title: Gragas nerf
body: The gragas nerf was very much unneeded his winrate is 46.8% and is going to get worse he wasn't even that good in lcs {{champion:79}} .

replies.body:
Gragas was my favorite tank jungler, and they have hurt him so badly with that nerf. Saintvicious said in his patch notes he's pretty much gone now. Not going to see play any more. It's possible. That was a HUGE nerf.

Riot rarely does their nerfs gently. It's oftentimes a champion killer. This nerf to Gragas is too severe.

Of course... He isn't call the BEEEEEEEEEEEEG man for no reason...

And yea.. the nerf was NOT needed. (Not as NOT needed as the Rek Sai nerf... but still not needed.)

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IgJ3EGZl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-02T16:57:35.977+0000)
>
> Of course... He isn't call the BEEEEEEEEEEEEG man for no reason...
> 
> And yea.. the nerf was NOT needed. (Not as NOT needed as the Rek Sai nerf... but still not needed.)

I felt like the maokai nerf was kinda harsh to I never see him in solo q.
Aren't you tired of seeing tanks in lcs? I wish they buff carry junglers..
